thread.title: Marco Vigilante
thread.title_full: Arancebio recensione scritta da Marco Vigilante

author: Marco Vigilante
title: Marco Vigilante
text: I have made several orders of Tarocco oranges with Arancebio this year. Danilo has been always helpful in providing the best oranges, at superfast speed (less than 3 days from Sicily to Holland). The Oranges are very flavoured, juicy, in perfect conditions, well packaged (double flute cardboard boxes). My four years son had no doubts and eat the oranges from Sicily, while always refusing the ones purchased at the local supermarket. The truth of the innocents ! Thanks I would recommend to anyone. Marco Vigilante
